price: (Unazirikane) ubwo indyarya n’abafite uburwayi mu mitima yabo (bwo gushidikanya) bavugaga bati “Ibyo Allah n’Intumwa ye badusezeranyije ni ibinyoma”.
arabic: وَإِذۡ يَقُولُ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقُونَ وَٱلَّذِينَ فِي قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٞ مَّا وَعَدَنَا ٱللَّهُ وَرَسُولُهُۥٓ إِلَّا غُرُورٗا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wa-idh yaqūlu al-munāfiqūna wa-alladhīna fī qulūbihim maraḍun mā waʿadanā al-lahu warasūluhu illā ghurūran
